body.p: In the you can define a reference to a folder that contains custom actions.

Once the add-on is installed, the New Document wizard can be used to create either a new AI Positron Custom Action file that contains a custom action definition in JSON format or an AI Positron Custom Actions List that contains a JSON array with multiple defined actions. Validation and content completion are automatically provided for such custom action files. To edit multi-line parameter values, you can switch the edited action JSON definition file to the Author visual editing mode.

If you save the action definition files in the custom actions folder defined in the AI Positron Assistant preferences page, the AI Positron Assistant view automatically reloads its Actions list to include them.
Various examples of custom AI actions can be found here and can be used as starting points for your own similar AI actions.
